name: the scrimblo bimblo files
description:
a very badly made spoof on the world of analog horror

the scrimblo bimblo files is a game I made for newgrounds' 2022 halloween spooktacular, released on october 31st.

features:

  • various scenarios that will shit my pants
  • spooky scenes
  • three endings

credits

TrackTribe & Shufflehound - music

testing - uuori, ca850, BonQ

everything else - me :)

software used

audacity for making things sound authentic (including all the music, sfx. etc)

sam: software automatic mouth for the third section of the game

speakonia for the dude at the start

godot engine for making the entire game

flash cs6 - all the hand-drawn stuff (the dude at the start, logos, etc.)
